trans-unit.source: Represents controls that provide, and are able to switch between, multiple representations of the same set of information or child controls.
trans-unit.target: Representa os controles que fornecem e pode alternar entre várias representações do mesmo conjunto de informações ou controles filho.

trans-unit.source: Examples of controls that can present multiple views include the list view (which can show its contents as thumbnails, tiles, icons, or details), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] charts (pie, line, bar, cell value with a formula), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_word](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-word-md.md)] documents (normal, Web layout, print layout, reading layout, outline), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_outlook](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-outlook-md.md)] calendar (year, month, week, day) and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wmp](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] skins.
trans-unit.target: Exemplos de controles que podem apresentar vários modos de exibição incluem a exibição de lista (que pode mostrar o conteúdo como miniaturas, lado a lado, ícones ou detalhes), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] gráficos (pizza, linha, barras, valor da célula com uma fórmula), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_word](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-word-md.md)] documentos (normal, layout da Web, layout de impressão, layout de leitura, estrutura de tópicos), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_outlook](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-outlook-md.md)] calendário (ano, mês, semana, dia) e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wmp](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] capas.

trans-unit.source: The supported views are determined by the control developer and are specific to each control.
trans-unit.target: As exibições com suporte são determinadas pelo desenvolvedor do controle e são específicas para cada controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Valores de propriedade em cache devem ser anteriormente solicitados usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Current%2A>para obter o valor atual de uma propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém o cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade solicitada não está no cache.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Esse padrão deve ser de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>com um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>referência para obter os valores atuais.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>foi obtida usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, ele contém somente dados armazenados em cache e tentar obter o valor atual de qualquer propriedade gera uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Cached%2A>para obter o valor armazenado em cache de uma propriedade que foi previamente especificado usando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.CurrentView*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.CurrentView*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.CurrentView*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos de cliente de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the name of a control-specific view.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o nome de uma exibição de controle específicos.

trans-unit.source: View identifiers can be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Identificadores de exibição podem ser recuperados usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control-specific collection of view identifiers is identical across instances.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de controle específicos de identificadores de exibição é idêntica entre instâncias.

trans-unit.source: View names are suitable for use in Text to Speech, Braille, and other accessible applications.
trans-unit.target: Nomes de exibição são adequados para uso em texto em fala, Braille e outros aplicativos acessíveis.

trans-unit.source: The control-specific view identifier.
trans-unit.target: O identificador da exibição de controle específicos.

trans-unit.source: A localized string representing the control-specific view name.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres localizada que representa o nome de exibição de controle específicos.

trans-unit.source: viewId is not a member of the supported views collection.
trans-unit.target: viewIdnão é um membro da coleção de exibições com suporte.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern"> </xref> padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador padrão é passado para métodos como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>recuperar o padrão de controle de interesse de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> especificado</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Sets the current control-specific view.
trans-unit.target: Define o modo de exibição atual do controle específico.

trans-unit.source: View identifiers can be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Identificadores de exibição podem ser recuperados usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control-specific collection of view identifiers is identical across instances.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de controle específicos de identificadores de exibição é idêntica entre instâncias.

trans-unit.source: A control-specific view identifier.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador de exibição de controle específicos.

trans-unit.source: viewId is not a member of the supported views collection.
trans-unit.target: viewIdnão é um membro da coleção de exibições com suporte.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the property that gets the control-specific collection of views.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade que obtém a coleção de controle específicos de modos de exibição.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos de cliente de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: This property is not present in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation> and must be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não está presente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>e deve ser recuperada usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
